assessment_item.subject: Social Studies
assessment_item.title: ಈ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ಅಂಶವು ಜನಮಂದೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿದೆ
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಈ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ಅಂಶವು ಜನಮಂದೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿದೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಚಲನ ಚಿತ್ರ ಮಂದಿರದ ಮುಂದೆ ಸೇರಿರುವ ಜನಸ್ತೋಮ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:6241"},{"text":"

 ತರಗತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಕುಳಿತಿರುವ ವಿದ್ಯಾರ್ಥಿಗಳ ಗುಂಪು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6242"},{"text":"

 ಕಾರ್ಖಾನೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಕೆಲಸ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಿರುವ ಕಾರ್ಮಿಕರ ಗುಂಪು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6252"},{"text":"

ಮೈದಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಆಟವಾಡುತ್ತಿರುವ ಆಟಗಾರರ ಗುಂಪು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6257"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಈ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ಅಂಶವು ಜನಮಂದೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿದೆ ","title":"ಈ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ಅಂಶವು ಜನಮಂದೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿದೆ ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
assessment_item.name: ಈ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ಅಂಶವು ಜನಮಂದೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿದೆ
